hero.title: Hi, I'm Henry P
hero.typingSvgAlt: Animated text: Full Stack Developer, Linux Enthusiast, Open Source Contributor
hero.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with a love for Linux and open-source projects. Let's build something amazing together!

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly web applications. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I enjoy tackling complex problems and turning ideas into reality.

experience1.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
experience1.description: Lead development of multiple web applications, mentored junior developers, and implemented best practices for code quality and performance.

experience2.title: Full Stack Developer
experience2.description: Developed and maintained various client projects, focusing on responsive design and optimizing database queries for improved performance.

job1.description: Leading development teams, architecting scalable solutions, and implementing cutting-edge technologies to drive business growth.

job2.description: Developed and maintained multiple web applications, focusing on responsive design and optimizing performance.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Check out some of my recent work

project1.title: Hypr Dot
project1.description: A modern and customizable configuration for the Hypr window manager, featuring a sleek design and efficient workflows.

project2.title: Python CLI Tool
project2.description: A command-line interface tool built with Python for automating common development tasks.

project3.title: Database Optimizer
project3.description: A MySQL database optimization tool that analyzes query performance and suggests improvements.
